tour_name: Japan & South Korea: Ancient Traditions & Modern Marvels

sections.title: Tokyo: A Metropolis of Modernity and Tradition
sections.content: Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Tokyo. Explore the neon-lit streets, visit the serene Imperial Palace, a symbol of Japan's imperial history, and participate in a hands-on sushi-making class, learning the art of preparing this culinary delicacy.  Enjoy the comfort and convenience of the 4-star Tokyo Dome Hotel, ideally located in the heart of the city.

sections.title: Mt. Fuji & Hakone: Natural Beauty and Relaxation
sections.content: Journey to the majestic Mt. Fuji, capturing breathtaking views of this iconic landmark.  Spend relaxing days in Hakone, a mountain resort town renowned for its hot springs.  Enjoy scenic cruises across Lake Ashi, surrounded by stunning landscapes, and rejuvenate your body and soul in the soothing thermal waters.

sections.title: Kyoto: Ancient Temples and Cultural Delights
sections.content: Discover the historical heart of Japan in Kyoto. Explore its captivating temples and serene gardens, including the thousands of vibrant red torii gates of Fushimi Inari Shrine.  Indulge in a refined Kaiseki dinner, a traditional multi-course Japanese haute cuisine, accompanied by an enchanting geisha performance, experiencing the elegance of Japanese traditional arts.

sections.title: Osaka & Hiroshima: Culinary Delights and Historical Reflection
sections.content: Explore the vibrant culinary scene of Osaka, known as Japan's kitchen.  Then, travel to Hiroshima and visit the poignant Peace Memorial Park, a powerful reminder of the importance of peace and understanding. Stay at premium hotels, such as the Hotel Granvia Hiroshima, ensuring a comfortable and memorable experience.

sections.title: Seoul: South Korea's Dynamic Capital
sections.content: Journey to Seoul, South Korea's bustling capital.  Explore the grandeur of Gyeongbokgung Palace, a magnificent royal palace.  Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of Myeongdong, indulging in delicious street food.  Visit the Demilitarized Zone (DMZ), a historical site offering a glimpse into the Korean peninsula's complex history. Stay in luxurious comfort at the 5-star Lotte Hotel Seoul.

sections.title: Busan & Gyeongju: Coastal Charms and Ancient History
sections.content: Discover the coastal beauty of Busan, known for its vibrant beaches and fresh seafood.  Travel to Gyeongju, a city steeped in history and home to numerous ancient sites.  Experience a unique temple stay at Golgulsa Temple, offering a deeper connection to Korean Buddhist culture.

sections.title: Jeju Island: Farewell to Paradise
sections.content: Conclude your journey on the stunning Jeju Island, famed for its breathtaking natural beauty and romantic landscapes. Enjoy a final farewell dinner at a high-end Korean BBQ restaurant, savoring the flavors of Korea one last time before departing.
